title: 01/10/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/10/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's wild game between the Chargers and Raiders. Did Brandon Staley actually make the right decision by deciding to call a timeout when he did? Louis Riddick reacts to a flurry of NFL Head Coaches getting fired in real time. And Carson Palmer tells us the best gift he ever bought his lineman when he was in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
